instructions.title: Making a Contribution
instructions.desc: Thank you for thinking to contribute to NEAR in Minutes ðŸš€ Checkout this guide to get started.
instructions.subTitle: How to fill form/issue
instructions.stepOne: Go to the issues section in
instructions.stepTwo: Click on a  New issue and choose the type of content you would like to contribute.
instructions.stepThree: Choose how you want to contribute and fill in the information accordingly.
instructions.seeExample: If you like to see an example of a submitted issue
instructions.learnMore: If you want to get more information on how to make a good video
instructions.types: Currently we have three types of contribution:
instructions.newContentDesc: if you have a video in mind you would like to create and add to the collection of videos.
instructions.newTopicDesc: if you would like to translate the content to another language. Currently we support Turkish and Hindi.
instructions.translateDesc: if you have a topic in mind and you would like to suggest so someone else can make a tutorial about it.
